channel.title: Jquery on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in Jquery on SpiderSoft

item.title: interesting jQuery alternative – laroux.js
item.description: If we are talking about jQuery alternatives there is not much on the market. With age jQuery put a little bit on weight, not mentioning it’s speed. If we are talking about weight and speed we have Zepto.js and… we can use pure JavaScript which isn’t especially convenient in larger  projects. But definitely it’s much more but… it’s faster.

item.title: How to force jQuery version on WordPress
item.description: Another really simple code snippet. This time, we are trying to force particular version of jQuery injecting into WordPress.

item.title: Serialize form to object – jQuery
item.description:
It’s pretty easy to serialise form using jQuery –

$('#formid').serialize();

or by

$('#formid').serializeArray();

But neither of them it’s easy to modify. Really useful snippet – serialise form to object.
